The **Virtual Biophysical Lab** is presented and discussed at selected
scientific meetings and mission-oriented workshops. These venues are used
to share methodological advances, prototype tools, and reproducible
examples related to radiative transfer modelling, imaging spectroscopy,
and EO-based plant trait retrieval.

---

## Next conferences

::: {.vbl-card}

- **[ESA Digital Twin Earth Components – Open Science Meeting 2026](https://nikal.eventsair.com/esa-digital-twin-earth-components-open-science-meeting-2026/)**  
  *2–5 February 2026 · ESA-ESRIN, Frascati, Italy*  
  ESA open science meeting dedicated to **Digital Twin Earth**
  components, mission-oriented methods, Cal/Val readiness, and
  multi-sensor integration.

- **[FLEX-Fluorescence 2026 Workshop](https://flex-fluorescence-workshop-2026.esa.int/)**  
  *3–6 March 2026 · Bonn, Germany*  
  International ESA workshop focused on the latest developments in
  fluorescence remote sensing and updates on the **FLEX–Sentinel-3
  tandem mission**.

- **[14th EARSeL Workshop on Imaging Spectroscopy](https://is.earsel.org/workshop/14-IS-Helsinki2026/)**  
  *2–4 June 2026 · Helsinki, Finland*  
  International scientific workshop on imaging spectroscopy, covering
  methods, sensors, applications, and reproducible workflows.

:::
